translations: （机器）哔哔响，嘟嘟响；（使）（汽车喇叭）鸣响；用传呼机召唤，呼（某人）
（电子设备的）哔哔声；（汽车喇叭的）嘟嘟声；警笛声

sentences.sentence: Does the computer beep on power-up?
sentences.translation: 电脑开机时发出“哔”的响声吗？

sentences.sentence: There is also a short door closing beep.
sentences.translation: 同时亦有一个关门时短促的哔声。

sentences.sentence: Please beep Tom and tell him to meet us at the west gate of the university.
sentences.translation: 请呼叫一下汤姆，告诉他在大学的西门和我们见面。
